title: available-skus.request
description: Request to get a list of available SKUs for a vendor by specifying either a specific branch or a subAccount.

accountId.description: The main account identifier for the supplier

customIdentifierFields.description:
A collection of identifiers specific to the Vendor.
These were either previously returned by the vendor, or configured by the user based on vendor-specific inputs

callbackData.description: Generic data that is specified by the previous request's CallbackInfo

itemIds.description: List of items to check availability for
